HEA_composition.composition: slightly deviated from equimolar (approx. 6:1:1:1:1 for each metal)

synthesis.precursors: Five metal precursors (exact amounts given in Table S1, ESI)

solution.solvent: 15 mL of 0.1 M HCl (aq), 5 mL isopropanol

reaction_conditions.reaction_time: no specific time mentioned; rapid heating under 220°C

TEM.particle_size_nm: 3.6–4.6 nm (except for Ir-rich alloy NPs, 3.0 ± 0.7 nm)

XRD.Vegard_law_observation: Lattice constant increases linearly with metal composition

XPS.composition_consistency: Surface and bulk compositions match, confirming solid-solution structure

HAXPES.VB_spectrum: Broad and featureless VB spectra, fewer features than monometallic NPs

electrochemical_performance.d_band_correlation: No clear correlation between d-band center and HER activity observed
